Globus Module
=============

The Globus module provides utilities for data transfer and cloud storage integration.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Globus
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

I/O Utilities
-------------

Input/output utilities for Globus data transfer.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Globus.io
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

N5 to Slice Conversion
----------------------

Convert N5 format to slice-based formats.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Globus.n5toslice

   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
